input_args.passage: 'Answers in Genesis - Wikipedia | The organization sees evolution as incompatible with the Bible and believes anything other than the young Earth view is a compromise on the principle of biblical inerrancy., a compromise on the principle of biblical inerrancy'
input_args.claim: 'From source, we learn that Answers in Genesis, an organization similar to Creation Ministries International (CMI), sees evolution as incompatible with the Bible and believes that anything other than the young earth view is a compromise on the principle of biblical inerrancy.'
